title: Physical Therapist Interview
Interview Descriptions: The interview was 3 rounds total. Overall, it was an easygoing interview process. Staff members I talked to were very welcoming and friendly. Prompt response from recruiter and hiring manager

title: Director, Marketing Communications Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Asbury Communities (Maryville, TN) in Jun 2019
Interview Descriptions: The phone interview and in-person interviews both went well and I was told they would conduct callbacks for a staff interview in two weeks’ time. After two contacts in follow up I was told they would “get back with me soon.” Over a month past that time and nothing...no further replies via email either. The job is still posted as open.
Interview Questions: When did I take on a big challenge and explain that.

title: Marketing Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Asbury Communities (Frederick, MD) in Feb 2019
Interview Descriptions: Best interview I ever had , the people I met with made me so comfortable . We met at the corporate office in Frederick (very chic office) . Once the interview was complete I got a call back within a week with an offer letter.
Interview Questions: Behavioral questions regarding how I handle a situation.

title: Special Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Asbury Communities in Sept 2018
Interview Descriptions:
I was put through a lengthy (2 month) and difficult interview process for an executive level position:

1. Brief screening by phone
2. Brief in person screening with 1 person from HR
3. Full panel interview with 5 executives
4. Full interview with CEO
Interview Questions: I was asked to watch a 1 hour keynote and provide a written summary, as well as prepare a 15 minute presentation, to be delivered at my interview.

title: Dining Services Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Asbury Communities (Kingsport, TN) in Jan 2018
Interview Descriptions: Easy and simple. Basic questions, nice interviewer, quick in and out. Residents who came by during interview were all very nice as well. Recommend at least interviewing with them. Decent pay, overall recommend.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here?

title: Secretary Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Asbury Communities
Interview Descriptions: The hiring and  interview process was done smoothly.  HR interviewed and then the drug screening and references were checked.  An offer was made and I came through the orientation.

title: Licensed Practical Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Asbury Communities (Gaithersburg, MD) in Feb 2016
Interview Descriptions: Called as a group to answer questions on a piece of paper. We opened index cards and read and answer clinical questions. Questions were reasons questions such as diabetic, dementia, emergency cares.

title: Aide Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Asbury Communities (Centerville, OH) in Jan 2016
Interview Descriptions: Three interviews. A phone interview and two in person interviews with hr and the floor manager. We would sit down talk about past experiences and how we would fit into Bethany village and it’s culture. Also talked about flexibility and hours

title: Lpn Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Asbury Communities (Maryville, TN) in Nov 2015
Interview Descriptions: Interview by mentors and the like you they will give a tour and then you wait for back ground checks and drug test. Then orientation is 4 days then you work the floor. To fast
Interview Questions: How well do you with others

title: Caregiver Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Asbury Communities (Maryville, TN) in Jul 2015
Interview Descriptions:
Very quick and rushed.  
I met with the manager and she sent me all over town to get my finger prints checked and drug tests done. The whole thing was unprofessional. 
I was informed of my employment the same day of  interview.
Interview Questions: Are you comfortable with touching/cleaning human bodily fluids.

title: CNA Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Asbury Communities (Maryville, TN) in Apr 2015
Interview Descriptions: Friendly, quick process and hired on the spot.. They held a job fair and I believe they got rid of their problem employees and was starting fresh..I will workout fine because I care for my residents..The facility seems clean and upscale.

title: Dining Room Interview
Application Type: I applied through a staffing agency. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Asbury Communities (Gaithersburg, MD) in Sept 2014
Interview Descriptions:
First interview: meeting with the manager and they ask the usual question like how you handle stress and all that

Second Interview: it is a shadowing where you follow a current employee and you get to ask question as they explain some of the position in more details.You get to experience the work environment and meet some of the employ.Make sure to be friendly and ask question so they will remember you

Third interview: with a higher position person who is gonna ask your schedule and some more question about the schedule of the work
Interview Questions: They will ask question focused on the position than the company itself

title: CNA Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Asbury Communities (Johnson City, TN)
Interview Descriptions: Unlike professional jobs, this job did not use a structured interview process. The process was mainly to determine whether or not the skills required for care giving in the long-term care giving environment were available. the process also sought to establish job record, perhaps to establish dependability.
Interview Questions: For example, would you be willing to work weekends?

title: Certified Nursing Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Asbury Communities (Gaithersburg, MD)
Interview Descriptions: Mass interview...supervisor is very welcoming and makes you feel very comfortable. Typical behavior interviews
Interview Questions: There weren't any difficult or unexpected questions

title: DINNING ROOM ATTENDANT Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 days. I interviewed at Asbury Communities (Gaithersburg, MD) in Feb 2013
Interview Descriptions: It was easy not too many questions not too long manager was nice should use personal references to your life when answering situationally questions don't try to answer what u think they want to hear answer what you would say

title: QMA Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 4 days. I interviewed at Asbury Communities (Greencastle, IN) in Jan 2013
Interview Descriptions: The interview was professional and relaxed. The DON was very nice. The atmosphere was not intimidating. I hate interviews myself but they made the process enjoyable. The questions were not hard.
Interview Questions: How would you handle a difficult situation involving a resident who did not want to take their meds.

title: Lpn Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Asbury Communities (Mechanicsburg, PA) in Jan 2013
Interview Descriptions: Preliminary phone interview followed by face to face interview. Reference check, job offer, drug test, 2 step PPD. Job offer then based on successful completion of listed steps. Approximately 2wks from applying to completing interview process.
Interview Questions: How did you handle a stressful, fast paced work environment?
